about_the_game:
As a seasoned military officer, you are humanity’s last hope to rebuild what was lost. Your mission: restore civilization by constructing a fortified settlement, recruiting survivors, and uncovering the origins of the deadly outbreak.

Start by establishing a safe haven amidst the chaos, gathering resources, and building strong defenses. As you venture from town to town, recruit skilled survivors with unique abilities to join your cause and expand your settlement. But survival is only part of the battle. Within the ruins, you'll discover fragments of a dark military conspiracy that unleashed the zombie virus upon the world.

The main challenge it to balance strategy, exploration, and survival as you race against time to save humanity from extinction. Will you rebuild society, or will the world remain broken forever?

--- Important Note ---

Game in development by a solo developer and owner of the HTF Games Studio youtube channel where you can watch the Dev Logs to see the progress.

  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-9100 / AMD Ryzen 3 2300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon™ RX 560 (4GB VRAM)
